root.name: Al Unser Jr. Turbo Racing
root.description: Al Unser Jr. Turbo Racing is a surprisingly sophisticated racing simulation that lets players take control of Al's car, or create their own as they work their way through the World Grand-Prix Series. Cars are customized using a point distribution system, with modifiable attributes such as color, speed, acceleration, durability, suspension, pit crew speed and turbo. Races take place in 16 different counties, with one track in each location.
